rules_text:
{W}{U} CONTROL TIDAL Be as patient as the tides and win with a surge of value.
{U}{B} SPELLSLINGER ENERGY Your noncreature spells are imbued with energy.
{B}{R} SACRIFICE Sacrifice or discard your creatures to reap the sea’s bounty.
{R}{G} FEROCIOUS The oceans teem with creatures with power 4 or greater.
{G}{W} COUNTERS Probe the depths shielded by +1/+1 counters.
{W}{B} SPELLSLINGER TIDAL The sea’s grasp can double your cast triggers.
{B}{G} CREATURE ENERGY Elves and leviathans alike embrace the energy of the ocean.
{G}{U} BIG ENERGY Spend mana or energy, just go over the top of your foe.
{U}{R} ARTIFACTS The benthic deep hides untold riches.
{R}{W} GEAR Equipment and Vehicles enable you to explore the fearsome brine.
